DataElement.preferredName: Cancer Treatment Concurrent Administered Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Concurrent use of other anti-cancer therapy including chemotherapy agents, target agents, or biological agents.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the concurrent administration of an intervention for management of a malignant neoplasm.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any intervention for management of a malignant neoplasm.

Concepts.definition: Any intervention for management of a malignant neoplasm.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring or operating at the same time.:Given.

Concepts.definition: Occurring or operating at the same time.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received an investigational anti-cancer drug within 28 days preceding the first dose of dabrafenib?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is the patient receiving any o
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient receiving any other anticancer investigational agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient currently participating in or has participated in a study of an investigational agent or using an investigational device within 4 weeks of the first dose of treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational agents less than or equal to 28 days prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other type of investigational agents within 28 days before the first dose of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other approved or investigational agent less than 3 weeks prior to registration unless otherwise noted by the Protocol Chair

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any other therapies for cancer treatment (with the exception of GnRH agonists for prostate cancer)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient is receiving any other anti-cancer therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any other investigational agents for cancer?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient receiving any other anti-cancer or investigation drug therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any other biologic, cytotoxic or investigational agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational agent within 4 weeks prior to Cycle 1, Day 1 (or within five half-lives of the investigational product, whichever is shorter)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational agent within 4 weeks prior to Cycle 1, Day 1 (or within five half-lives of the investigational product, whichever is longer)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational agents within the past 28 days?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other experimental drug or therapy within 21 days of baseline?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational drugs within 28 days (or five half-lives, whichever is shorter; with a minimum of 14 days from the last dose) preceding the first dose of talimogene laherparepvec (T-VEC) and during the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational agent within 4 weeks prior to Cycle 1, Day 1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 17
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any investigational therapy within 4 weeks of enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient receiving any other anti-cancer or investigational drug therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 18
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational agent within 4 weeks prior to Cycle 1, Day 1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational agents within the past 28 days prior to cycle 1 day 1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 20
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational agent within 4 weeks (or within five half-lives of the investigational product, whichever is shorter) prior to Cycle 1, Day 1 (minimum of 1 week between prior therapy and study enrollment)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 19
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any other investigational agents or anticancer therapy concurrently or within 4 weeks (i.e. 28 days)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 21
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any investigational therapy within 4 weeks of study entry?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 23
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational agent within 3 weeks prior to Cycle 1, Day 1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 24
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any other investigational agent or participated in another clinical study with an investigational product during the last 30 days or five half-lives of the drug (whichever is greater) prior to the initiation of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 28
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational, chemotherapeutic or targeted drugs within 28 days (or five half-lives, whichever is shorter; with a minimum of 14 days from the last dose) preceding the first dose of talimogene laherparepvec (T-VEC) and during the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 25
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any other concurrent investigational agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 27
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any other investigational agents, concurrently?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 26
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any other investigational agent or participated in another clinical study with an investigational product during the last 30 days or five half-lives of the drug (whichever is less) prior to the initiation of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 29
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient concurrently participating on another clinical study with investigational medicinal product or any other investigational agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 30
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient currently participating and receiving study therapy or has participated in a study of an investigational agent and received study therapy or used an investigational device within 4 weeks of the first dose of treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 31
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient actively receiving any other investigational agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 32
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient receiving any other investigational agents or has received any other type of investigational agent within 4 weeks prior to first dose of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 22
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any other concurrent anti-cancer therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 33
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any other investigational drugs?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 34
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving or planning to receive any investigational agents other than tocilizumab except for: investigational agents directed at a patient's underlying cancer, investigational SARS-CoV-2 anti-viral agents or convalescent serum directed at COVID-19 disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 35
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving or planning to receive any investigational agents other than tocilizumab except for: investigational agents directed at a patient's underlying cancer, investigational SRAS-CoV-2 anti-viral agents or convalescent serum directed at COVID-19 disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 001
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient receiving any other investigational agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 36
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any other investigational agents within 28 days prior to start of treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 37
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received other investigational drugs within 28 days (or five half-lives, whichever is shorter; with a minimum of 14 days from the last dose) preceding the first dose of study treatment and during the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 38
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received investigational therapy less than or equal to 4 weeks or within a time interval less than at least five half-lives of the investigational agent, whichever is longer, before initiation of protocol therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG TEXT1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive any prior investigational agent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG CRF TEXT1
ReferenceDocuments.description: If investigational agent was received within 28 days prior to registration, has it been at least 5 half lives since agent end date?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 39
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received investigational therapy within four weeks before starting study treatment or is scheduled to receive investigational therapy during the planned treatment period?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 40
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received treatment with any other investigational agent within 4 weeks before initiation of study treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 42
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving concurrent anticancer treatment, major surgery, or use of any investigational drug within 28 days before the start of trial treatment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 41
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any other investigational agents, within 30 days of the start of this trial and throughout the duration of this trial?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient currently receiving another investigational drug?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 43
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received treatment with any other agent administered for the treatment of the patient's cancer, within four half-lives or 4 weeks prior to Cycle 1, Day 1, whichever is shorter?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - Corrected 43
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received treatment with any other agent administered for the treatment of the patient's cancer, within four half-lives or 4 weeks prior to cycle 1, Day 1, whichever is shorter?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 44
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient concurrently receiving any other antineoplastic treatment or investigational agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 45
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received treatment with any other investigational agent within 4 weeks prior to Cycle 1, Day 1?
